resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."
"Lothian's website no longer supports future departures beyond the current day :("

"Changes:
 * Add traffic alerts view (in the bookmarks menu).
 * Initial map location is now the last known location instead of the centre of Edinburgh.
 * Check Google StreetView is installed when trying to launch it.
 * Fix more misc errors.
"
